title: LFT ADC MID JUNGLE SUPPORT MAIN GOLD
body: Hi im currently in Gold 5 and im looking for a team where I can fit in I have a very versatile play style and I never rage. I have skype as well. Add me IGN: iHex to find more about me

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team?sort_type=recent 

Hey if you want click this link it will take you to my thread for gold/plat players :)
So are you looking for 4 members to create a team or are you looking for a team? This thread is ambiguously written.

main: support 
age: 20
rank: silver 4
I'm also looking for people willing to join/make a ranked team with me... add me if you're interested.
I prefer playing with some form of verbal communication. ^_^ ty
im a support main add me have some norms with me i know im better then bronze
